item.title: Meta’s first dedicated AI app is here with Llama 4 — but it’s more consumer than productivity or business oriented
item.description: This mainstream exposure will likely accelerate a shift in what people expect not just from consumer apps, but from workplaces...

item.title: Tripp launches Kōkua AI as mental wellness coach across multiple platforms
item.description: Tripp launched Kōkua AI, a mental wellness guide designed to deliver real-time, personalized emotional support across multiple platforms.

item.title: xMEMS extends micro cooling fan-on-a-chip tech to AI data centers
item.description: xMEMS Labs, a pioneer of MEMS-based chips, announced that its innovative µCooling fan-on-a-chip tech will be expanded to AI data centers.

item.title: Alibaba launches open source Qwen3 model that surpasses OpenAI o1 and DeepSeek R1
item.description: Qwen3’s open-weight release under an accessible license marks an important milestone, lowering barriers for developers and organizations.

item.title: Ex-OpenAI CEO and power users sound alarm over AI sycophancy and flattery of users
item.description: Crucially, the turbulence also nudges many organizations to explore open-source models they can host, monitor, and fine-tune themselves.
